title: Worms Reloaded GOTY 1.0.0.478 (online) (Steam/noSteam)
description:
Worms Reloaded G.O.T.Y. edition online/offline

Features of this edition: 

- Updated to version 1.0.0.478.
- The game can be played online (using Steam) and offline.
- Reduced installer.
- Multilanguage.
- A guide about how to play online is included.
- The needed libraries to play are included, and also Steam's installer.
- Nothing has been deleted.


Steps to play online:

1. Install the game .
2. Install Steam (you can find it at the folder "#JIMBO" or install it from the installer).
3. Start Steam.
4. Start the game from "WormsReloaded.exe", NOT from Steam.
5. Create a lobby and invite your Steam friends.

It is highly recommended to use "options.cmd" to launch the game and to change the appid
